description:
'The Palms on Mitchell' is the latest residential development created from the collaboration of the established developer Westcon and designer, K Architecture.

Westcon is delivering eight apartments over five levels, with a luxe design, sumptuous features, and considerable size. This set of apartments is poised to be one of the must-have properties for an exclusive group of buyers; that will be part of establishing the new era of modern developments in the highly sought-after Townsville suburb of North Ward.

Curated with a strong focus on the relaxed tropic lifestyle The Palms on Mitchell is removed one street from the noisy hustle and bustle of The Strand esplanade main thoroughfare, but keeps all the benefits of coastal living in its more quietly located position of 64 Mitchell Street, North Ward. Closely located to the popular Gregory Street café and culinary precinct and only a short distance to all essential amenities, the apartments are conducive to the relaxed and peaceful atmosphere that is being offered.

The interior design of the apartments has been layered elegantly yet simplistic with a calming palette of neutrals and high-quality appliances, fixtures, and fittings, serving to establish the new era of the modern tropic aesthetic. As part of its design, each apartment has its own private elevator entrance, equipped with a full intercom and security system. Each apartment offers three generously size bedrooms, a modern timeless kitchen with stone benchtops and quality appliances, along with two full bathrooms plus a powder room to tie in and finish the overall engaging and timeless aesthetic.

The orientation of the building is positioned well for the ocean breeze to flow right through each apartment, with the front entertaining deck facing The Strand and with a rear balcony off the master suite giving you the beautiful natural backdrop of Castle Hill.

Positioned to the right side on the ground floor is the private pool for relaxation and leisure. The private drive-through entrance with an automatic door leads into the undercover secured car parking, each apartment has two of its own car parking spaces.

Unit 401 is a top floor Three-bedroom apartment with views to Cleveland Bay covering 202 sqm and can be yours for $1,500,000.
Unit 101 is a large first-floor Three-bedroom apartment with a large rear terrace covering over 303m2 and is available for $1,325,000.

Stunning Architect-Designed Complex
Limited Availability with only 8 Apartments over 4 Levels
All with Balconies, Direct Lift Access & Secure Parking
Luxury Finishes Throughout
Private Inground Swimming Pool
Direct Lift access from Carpark to the Apartment
Air-conditioned Throughout
Both Level One Apartments with Large Terraces
First-year Strata $1444 Approximately Quarterly

Inquire today for full details.

*** Please be advised the images shown are artist impressions.
